name: Code Documentation Technich Agent
shortDescription: Creates a comprehensive README.md file based on the project schedule and technical guidelines.
fullDescription: This agent generates a full README.md for the project, following clear documentation standards. It structures the content logically, highlights functionalities, installation procedures, troubleshooting steps, and maintenance records. The README serves as a quick reference and user guide, ensuring clarity and accessibility for all audiences.
UseCases: Essential for projects requiring well-organized and professional technical documentation, supporting developers, users, and maintenance teams with structured guidance.
